data.why:
A wrapper class for Getopt::Long, that simplifies specification of
    arguments and parsing.

    A new module based on File::Find (I propose File::FindByRegex) wich
    finds files in directories trees based on regular expressions that
    match its names, and for each matched file, exec some specified
    subroutine.

    I' planning for new modules related to Petri Nets and Teradata
    database.

meta.subject: PAUSE ID request (BADAJOZ; Enrique Castilla Contreras)
